closed note (near Szentmihálydomb, Sopron) / * 2014 February 2 09:35 Created: Moved from OSB ID646797: / These streets are "home zone" /Lakő-pihenő övezet/, so you are not allowed to drive in, unless, you live here, or you are a guest by someone, who lives here. Should we mark this on the map? [EAttila, 2012-04-25 11:47:45 CEST] / A wiki szerint ezt highway=living_street-tel kell jelölni. Szerintem ennyi elég, külön ne jelöljünk behajtási tilalmat, szvsz az a navigáló szoftverek dolga, hogy eldöntsék, hogy egy adott országban keresztülnavigálhat-e egy living_street-en vagy sem. A Pihenőkereszt lakóparkban is ilyenek vannak. [NaTToMi, 2012-04-25 12:08:24 CEST] / access=destination [NoName, 2012-04-25 14:04:19 CEST] / I must disagree. It is clearly highway=living_street. access=destination doesn't cover all the features of a living street. [NaTToMi, 2012-04-25 15:21:31 CEST] / "so you are not allowed to drive in, unless, you live here" is clearly access=destination. But I didn't say highway=living_street is wrong. These tags can be combined very well! highway=living_street without explicit access tag allows everyone to enter the street. [NoName, 2012-04-25 15:40:04 CEST] / Then we must add bicycle=yes, motorcycle=yes, animal_drawn=yes, etc. Also, maxspeed=20. [NaTToMi, 2012-04-25 16:20:19 CEST] / * 2014 September 30 16:56 fkv Updated: IMO this should be vehicle=delivery. *=destination would allow people to drive in just to talk a walk, without visiting any residents. / * 2022 September 19 14:06 efi99 Resolved:
